title: This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village
description:
This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village has the added bonus of being in the Meredith Elementary School catchment and a stone’s-throw away from the iconic Philadelphia Italian Market. In this rowhome, you will have plenty of living space, a finished basement, skylights, exposed brick, and your own private roof deck with unobstructed city views - ideal for reading, hosting family and friends, or just a quiet evening in. Enter through a lovely vestibule where you will find the living room featuring hardwood floors on the left accompanied by a coat closet and a utility closet large enough to hold bikes and strollers in the vestibule. Off the living room enter the updated eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. The dining area is enhanced with a large skylight, pantry, and exposed brick. A traditional staircase leads to 2 large bedrooms on the second and third levels. The second floor is home to the first bedroom which includes a built-in closet and laundry closet with washer and dryer. This floor also has a newly renovated bathroom with a tub/shower combo, rain shower head, automatic humidity sensor, a vessel sink, person in room night light and open shelving. The third floor has a large master bedroom and en-suite full bathroom with tub/shower combo and linen closet. Spacious roof deck with room to grill and grow a container garden. This home is completed with a finished basement with good ceiling height where you will find an area perfect for a den, office, entertainment or workout room with extra storage and a utility closet. Each room is outfitted with custom window shades for plenty of natural light and privacy or blackout shade for afternoon naps, wired for ethernet and enhanced with the home’s smart thermostat, video doorbell, smart deadbolt, and smart alarm system. This home is conveniently located near Whole Foods, Acme, Headhouse Square, Penns Landing, Italian Market, Optimal and Sweat Fitness, multiple yoga studios, and all the restaurants and cafes Queen Village has to offer. For our first responders and future first responders, it is walkable distance to Pennsylvania Hospital and Thomas Jefferson University Hospital. Easy access to Columbus Blvd., Market St., I-95, I-676, The Ben Franklin Bridge, subways, and less than two blocks from bus routes in any direction make this a great home for the best of city living. Walkable to many playgrounds, preschools and kid-friendly amenities. 360 virtual and in person tours are available."

title: When Minutes Matter, Live Where You Work and Play
description:
Make yourself at home with us!
Our beautiful Apartment 216  is located within the fully renovated Croydon Hall located in Walnut Hill. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment features amazing views with tons of light in addition to granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, spacious layouts, environmentally friendly PVC and tile flooring, self-controlled heating and cooling via PTAC unit, and bathrooms equipped with a rainfall showerhead, tying everything together with sleek, modern finishes you'll be sure to love.
Monthly Rent: $1,550.00
Application Fee: $50 per applicant
Square Footage: 650
Lease Term: Flexible - Please Enquire!
Included Utilities: Water, Sewer, Trash, Recycle
Tenant Pays: Electric, Cable/Internet
Schools: Henry C. Lea Elementary, West Philadelphia High School
Parking: Street Parking is Free
Storage: Indoor Storage Units Available for $19.99/month
Unique Features
- Loading Zone for all your shopping needs
- Secure Entry with FOB access
- Online Resident Portal
- Smoke-Free Building
- Conference Room
- Free Bicycle Storage and Free Air for bike tires
- Enclosed Community Courtyard with gazebo, firepit, lawn games and grill!
- Recreation Lounge with TV, Games, Vending Machines, & more
The Amenities
- Lobby Staffed 24/7 with Package Concierge
- Elevator
- Recently renovated 24 hour Laundry Room with card or mobile app payment
- Fully Equipped Fitness Center in Building
- Recreation Lounge with TV, Games, Vending Machines, & more
- Playroom for the kiddies
Pet Policy
Pets are residents, too!
Two pets per apartment.
Breed & Weight restrictions apply*.
Non-refundable pet fee of $200/per pet.
The Community
- Within walking distance to Baltimore Ave., there are a number of cafes, restaurants, shops, co-ops, parks, community gardens, & even a tennis court in the neighborhood to enjoy!
- There are 2 bus stops within a block and a half (#42 & #21) and the MFL station is just a 10-15 minute stroll.
- Prefer to bike? We've got you covered with indoor bicycle racks, too!
Interested?
Property Management works on-site and is available M-F 9:30A-4:30P. Evening & weekend tours can be arranged with an agent as well. Need a virtual tour? We can offer that as well. Contact me today to schedule your private tour!
Don't see your move-in date?
Ask! We're sure to have something you'll love.
*All animals must be approved by management prior to move-in and during the course of the residency.
Photos are of our model apartment.
Availability is subject to change rapidly, so contact us ASAP to schedule your
private tour of our available floor plans!

title: This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village
description:
This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village has the added bonus of being in the Meredith Elementary School catchment and a stone’s-throw away from the iconic Philadelphia Italian Market. In this rowhome, you will have plenty of living space, a finished basement, skylights, exposed brick, and your own private roof deck with unobstructed city views - ideal for reading, hosting family and friends, or just a quiet evening in. Enter through a lovely vestibule where you will find the living room featuring hardwood floors on the left accompanied by a coat closet and a utility closet large enough to hold bikes and strollers in the vestibule. Off the living room enter the updated eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. The dining area is enhanced with a large skylight, pantry, and exposed brick. A traditional staircase leads to 2 large bedrooms on the second and third levels. The second floor is home to the first bedroom which includes a built-in closet and laundry closet with washer and dryer. This floor also has a newly renovated bathroom with a tub/shower combo, rain shower head, automatic humidity sensor, a vessel sink, person in room night light and open shelving. The third floor has a large master bedroom and en-suite full bathroom with tub/shower combo and linen closet. Spacious roof deck with room to grill and grow a container garden. This home is completed with a finished basement with good ceiling height where you will find an area perfect for a den, office, entertainment or workout room with extra storage and a utility closet. Each room is outfitted with custom window shades for plenty of natural light and privacy or blackout shade for afternoon naps, wired for ethernet and enhanced with the home’s smart thermostat, video doorbell, smart deadbolt, and smart alarm system. This home is conveniently located near Whole Foods, Acme, Headhouse Square, Penns Landing, Italian Market, Optimal and Sweat Fitness, multiple yoga studios, and all the restaurants and cafes Queen Village has to offer. For our first responders and future first responders, it is walkable distance to Pennsylvania Hospital and Thomas Jefferson University Hospital. Easy access to Columbus Blvd., Market St., I-95, I-676, The Ben Franklin Bridge, subways, and less than two blocks from bus routes in any direction make this a great home for the best of city living. Walkable to many playgrounds, preschools and kid-friendly amenities. 360 virtual and in person tours are available."

description:
The home at 1902 is a 1,185 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. title: Welcome to Cinnaminson Court
description: Welcome to Cinnaminson Court - An enclave of 18 twin townhouses set in a bucolic, quiet setting of Upper Roxborough surrounded by nature brought to you by local premier developer, PRDC Properties. Enter this premium lot 3-4 Bedroom/3 Bathroom home into an inviting and wide entry foyer with coat closet and mudroom area as well as access to 1-car garage. In the rear is a large office with sliding glass doors leading to the rear yard with adjoining full bathroom ideal for today's work from home lifestyle. Upstairs you will find your open-concept living floor with an abundance of natural light. Elegant step-down dining room with sliding glass doors opening out to a deck with lovely private tree views. Chef's eat-in kitchen features Bosch stainless steel appliance package, shaker cabinetry, quartz countertops and large island plus pantry closet. Large living room in the front with great natural light plus an optional bar area with wine refrigerator is ideal for entertaining. Ascend to the third floor replete with all 3 Bedrooms and 2 full Bathrooms which is truly a thoughtful and ideal floor plan. Primary suite in the front with large Bedroom with dual closets and an en-suite Bathroom with step-in shower and double vanity. In the hallway is a convenient laundry closet for a side-by-side washer/dryer. 2 additional Bedrooms with a shared full Bathroom complete this floor. Large roof deck with lovely green tree views. Finished lower level is great additional living space for a family room/media room/play room/ home office/home gym or guest quarters. Sliding glass doors opening out to the rear yard available for some homes. 1-car garage plus driveway parking as well as convenient guest parking. A very private, quiet location tucked away yet just a short walk down to the Ivy Ridge train station, easy access to Manayunk's Main Street, Chestnut Hill, Center City, major highways and the suburbs. 10 year property tax abatement.

title: Huge private yard in Graduate Hoptial-1 bed + office - 1st floor of duplex
description:
Enjoy the entire first floor of a well-kept duplex in Graduate Hospital at 20th and Fitzwater. Quiet, tree-lined street.
Rarely available unit--all prior tenants stayed for at least 3 years.
You have the entire backyard to yourself. Stamped concrete patio, small grassy area, raised beds. Yard maintenance is the tenant’s responsibility-if you aren’t interested in some light yard work this is not be the place for you.
Kitchen completely renovated 5 years ago with new appliances, lots of cabinet space, and granite counter tops. Dishwasher and garage disposal.
Layout (see my sketch): front bedroom, bathroom with shower stall, open kitchen & living room in the middle, and back office/den overlooking the backyard. There are two cased openings to this room WITHOUT doors, so it is open to the living room and would not work as a 2nd bedroom, but it offers a lot of useful space. Bedroom is carpeted (less than 5 years old), bath/kitchen tiled, hardwood in living room, low pile carpet in the office.
Lots of storage in the shared basement with washer and dryer for your  use only.
Central A/C.
Approx 625 sq feet.
The attached photos are three years old, when I listed it for the current tenant. She will try to send me updated photos this week (busy resident so she isn't home much), but it you are interested can email me for the new photos. Hasn't changed much since these pictures, though she has done a good amount of yard work, so that's the only area that is very different.
Upstairs unit occupied by long-term physician tenants. Very convenient to UPenn/CHOP/HUP. Route 40 & 17 are only a couple blocks away. Owner as well as most of the current and past tenants have been HUP physicians/residents.
Owners manage the unit from out of state, so we need tenants who are fairly self sufficient for minor issues. We have a handyman/plumber/electrician etc, and are quick to handle any major issues that arise. But any repairs less that $100 we expect the tenants to handle.  For example, the front door coded lock stopped functioning well. We bought a new one, but the upstairs tenant installed it. Our tenants have always found us responsive, but the relationship works best when we are all on the same page.  If you are only used to renting in apt buildings with on site maintenance, this would be a slight change.
I'm trying to limit showings only to seriously interested renters, as the unit is currently occupied and would need to be coordinated with the tenant. I am trying to do a more thorough screening than average with interested tenants to make sure that the apt could potentially meet your needs. Happy to answer any questions by email if you have any questions/concerns that could be handled before you see the apt. Please provide details about yourself and what you are looking for in an rental so I can better understand what you are looking for.
One cat is ok. Dogs decided on a case by case basis, for an additional monthly fee.
Available as early as June 1, but any early or mid June start would be accepted.
Tenant pays all utilities (around $100/mth for water/gas/electric).

title: Beautiful Studio with Granite, Laundry & Hardwoods - NO LIBS
description:
Available early April:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #204 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. This leading boutique building offers modern conveniences for modern living. The public spaces such as the elevator, mailroom, and multiple laundry rooms are custom engineered to minimize stress and maximize well-being. Unit #204 is a lovely studio apartment on the second floor. You enter the unit into into a hallway with a closet for additional storage. The spacious living area is L-shaped and offers hardwood floors and large windows along one wall for great natural light. There is tons of space for a bedroom and living room set up. The stunning kitchen features bar seating available at the counter, tile backsplash cabinetry above and below, an oven with electric cooktop, microwave, dishwasher, and refrigerator. There is an pantry area behind the kitchen for more storage options. Your full bathroom boasts sleek tiling, a shower/tub combo, and a vanity. All units have Central A/C! FREE laundry in laundry rooms located on the 1st, 2nd, and Penthouse floors of the building. Schedule a showing today!

title: MicroSuite In Haverford
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. title: On site washer and dryer, Beautiful courtyards, New fitness center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Great location! First fl & sublevel 3 bed 2 ba apt at Broad & Tasker!
description:
1531 S. Broad Street 1F - Available April
Amazing Location on South Broad Street in the ever popular Passyunk Square area. With a bike score of 77, transit score of 81, and walk score of 96 (Walkers Paradise) this location is only steps away from public transit, offers convenient access to major highway I95, and is within just a few blocks of shopping, renowned restaurants, popular watering holes, Acme food store, medical and educational facilities, the heart of the East Passyunk Ave district, Avenue of the Arts, and so much more.
This first floor unit in a five unit building is a large, gorgeous, renovated 3 bedroom 2 bathroom bi-level apartment with tall windows, wide-plank hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, energy efficient central air conditioning, radiator heat, ceramic tile bathrooms, lots of closet storage space, plus a free bonus room private storage room (8ft x 5ft x 8ft) in the common area basement.
This property features a bright sunny open layout with living room and kitchen that flow directly into one another creating a dramatically large space. The fully equipped contemporary kitchen features white shaker cabinets, granite counter tops, full size stainless steel appliances, French door refrigerator, dishwasher, built in microwave, garbage disposal, and a granite topped island with comfortable seating for four, all illuminated with a variety of attractive accent lighting. 2 bedrooms are located to the back of the property for excellent privacy, while the third bedroom is located in basement with super low ceilings. This unit also offers its own built in spacious laundry room with a full size washer and dryer.
Absolutely amazing apartment for someone looking to enjoy modern living in the East Passyunk /Lower Moyamensing area where you are close to everything.
Tenant is responsible for electric, heating gas, and a monthly water allotment.
Pet Policy: Cats and dogs under 35 pounds and allowed with a one $350 non-refundable pet fee plus $35/month pet rent.
